context_bundle.summary: Proven AutoHotkey v2.0 script patterns for Windows MCP automation. Includes window targeting by executable, SendText vs Send, sleep timing, and error handling patterns.

onboarding.quick_start: #Requires AutoHotkey v2.0 header, use WinExist('ahk_exe app.exe'), WinActivate, Sleep 500, SendText for strings, Send for special keys
common_patterns: WinExist('ahk_exe Code.exe') - target by executable name
Sleep 500 - ensure window focus before sending
Send '{Enter}' - for special keys with braces
known_errors: Missing #Requires directive causes v1/v2 syntax conflicts
Insufficient sleep timing causes lost characters
Window title matching less reliable than ahk_exe matching
